title: Funny Looking Angels
text:
Funny Looking Angels is a collaborative Christmas album recorded by <a href="Smith%20%26amp%3B%20Burrows">Smith & Burrows</a>, a band made up of English musicians <a href="Tom%20Smith%20%28musician%29">Tom Smith</a> (<a href="Editors%20%28band%29">Editors</a>) and <a href="Andy%20Burrows">Andy Burrows</a> (<a href="I%20Am%20Arrows">I Am Arrows</a>, <a href="We%20Are%20Scientists">We Are Scientists</a>, ex-<a href="Razorlight">Razorlight</a>). It was released on 25 November 2011 through <a href="Kitchenware%20Records">Kitchenware Records</a>.
The album contains four covers: "<a href="Only%20You%20%28Yazoo%20song%29">Only You</a>" by <a href="Yazoo%20%28band%29">Yazoo</a>, <a href="Black%20%28singer%29">Black</a>'s "<a href="Wonderful%20Life%20%28Black%20song%29">Wonderful Life</a>", "Funny Looking Angels" by Delta, and "On and On" by <a href="Longpigs">Longpigs</a>.
Promotion.
"Funny Looking Angels" was released as the lead single to promote the album.
The second single, "When the Thames Froze", was released on 12 December 2011. It has peaked at number 32 on the <a href="UK%20Indie%20Chart">UK Indie Chart</a>, and entered national charts in Belgium and the Netherlands.
Critical reception.
"Funny Looking Angels" received generally favourable reviews from music critics. At <a href="Metacritic">Metacritic</a>, which assigns a normalized rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream critics, the album received an average score of 63, based on 9 reviews.
